llm_response.description: The image shows extensive retinal hemorrhages, microaneurysms, and cotton wool spots. There are also signs of neovascularization, including flame-shaped hemorrhages and dot-blot hemorrhages. The overall appearance is consistent with proliferative diabetic retinopathy (PDR).
